input_paths.title: Input Paths
input_paths.description: List of paths to the input files (Fractal managed)

output_path.title: Output Path
output_path.description: Path to the output file (Fractal managed)

zarr_name.title: Zarr Name
zarr_name.description: Name of the zarr plate file that will be created

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Choose "MD Stack Acquisition" for 3D datasets, "SinglePlaneAcquisition" for 2D datasets or "MixedAcquisition" for combined acquisitions. [TBD selection improvements]

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: Plate layout for the Zarr file. Valid options are 96 and 384

overwrite.title: Overwrite
overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite the zarr file if it already exists

coarsening_xy.title: Coarsening Xy
coarsening_xy.description: Linear coarsening factor between subsequent levels. If set to `2`, level 1 is 2x downsampled, level 2 is 4x downsampled etc.

task_list.name: MD Convert OME-Zarr
task_list.docs_info:
Create OME-Zarr plate from MD Image Xpress files.

This is a non-parallel task => it parses the metadata, creates the plates
and then converts all the wells in the same process
